title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, May 25, 2021
description: “Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson, born this day in 1903.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson, born this day in 1903.
